roleset.name: to pollinate by means of cross-pollination

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: The application of herbicide would kill off the male-fertile plants , [*-1] leaving a large field of male-sterile plants that *T*2 can be cross-pollinated [*2] [*] to produce hybrid seed .

roleset.note: CROSSPOLLINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'crosspollinate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from crosspollinate.01-v predicate notes)
